Bought PvE pack, did not receive in-game content. I have already watched it on YouTube, not interested even in playing anymore. Small indie company, could not check if purchases through Steam would work for launch. They were busy paying John China for promotion. Blizzard polish is a joke.

i hate this game with every fiber of my being.

How much did they downgrade this game? I remember playing it for fun and excitement, all the heroes were free and you would get free stuff every few matches. Now characters are locked behind a paywall or huge grind, same for the skins. And they release the cancelled version of the PvE mode now, but it doesn't have any of the features promised years ago when they were working on overwatch 2?  No thanks, I'll just keep my money away from Blizzard.

Don't make any transactions through steam with this game!!! Blizzard will take your money, send you a receipt and not give you any content you pay for! 

If this is what us OW1 players waited 3 years for, than I have lost every morsel of hope I have for this IP. Each OWL team is about to receive a $6 Mill buyout and the league will collapse. This company cancelled the main vision of the game with the "Hero Mode" being scrapped. This mode was promised in 2019 and shown off years ago! Now all we get is a souped up Archives event that you have to PAY FOR! (Archives was a free mode in OW1, and this story mode in OW2 you have to pay $15 USD LOL) 

I'm going to say this is worse than Cyber Punk by a long shot! Please do yourself a favour and make some room on your SSD and uninstall this horrendous attempt at a sequel. Game of the year to now a game that has hyper monetization, locks heroes behind a battlepass and doesn't even give you the content you paid for.

An importing thing to note: I have over 5,000+ hrs in this game and I feel like everyone especially new players have been treated like crap since the launch of OW2 in Oct 2022. I feel the worst for the Team 4 Devs that had to see their hard work get re organised into a sorry attempt to line Blizzard Exec's pockets and please investors. 

This is now the Blizzard standard.
Spend your time on other games please, thank you.

- ziggy
Broken promises by the developers about what will be contained within this game. For shame. Overwatch 1 was excellent!

La gente juzga este juego no por lo que es, sino por lo que pudo haber sido.
